dcterms:creator: Erik F. Tjong Kim Sang
Fien De Meulder
dcterms:description: The CoNLL 2003 dataset is used for language-independent named entity recognition, providing annotated data for training and evaluating NER models.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2003

dcterms:creator: Erik F. Tjong Kim Sang
Fien De Meulder
dcterms:description: An enriched semantic annotation of errors for the CoNLL 2003 dataset, aimed at improving the understanding of errors in NER models.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2003 (enriched semantic annotation of errors)

dcterms:description: Diagnostic Sets (DCS) are created to analyze errors in NER models by providing context sentences that highlight specific linguistic challenges.
dcterms:title: Diagnostic Sets (DCS - Document Context Sentences)

dcterms:description: Template Sentences (TS) are used to test the ability of NER models to recognize named entities by replacing entities in predefined sentence structures.
dcterms:title: Template Sentences (TS)

dcterms:description: Random Sentences (RS) are generated to evaluate whether NER models overfit to specific datasets by using nonsensical or random text.
dcterms:title: Random Sentences (RS)
